items.name: case noFontChangeAction
items.desc: No action; the font is returned unchanged.

items.name: case viaPanelFontAction
items.desc: Converts the font according to the NSFontPanel method panelConvertFont:.

items.name: case addTraitFontAction
items.desc: Converts the font to have an additional trait using convert(_:toHaveTrait:).

items.name: case sizeUpFontAction
items.desc: Converts the font to a larger size using convert(_:toSize:).

items.name: case sizeDownFontAction
items.desc: Converts the font to a smaller size using convert(_:toSize:).

items.name: case heavierFontAction
items.desc: Converts the font to a heavier weight using convertWeight(_:of:).

items.name: case lighterFontAction
items.desc: Converts the font to a lighter weight using convertWeight(_:of:).

items.name: case removeTraitFontAction
items.desc: Converts the font to remove a trait using convert(_:toNotHaveTrait:).
